volumeId.description: The volume to retrieve annotations for.

layerId.description: The ID for the layer to get the annotations.

annotationDataId.description: The ID of the annotation data to retrieve.

contentVersion.description: The content version for the volume you are trying to retrieve.

allowWebDefinitions.description: For the dictionary layer. Whether or not to allow web definitions.

h.description: The requested pixel height for any images. If height is provided width must also be provided.

locale.description: The locale information for the data. ISO-639-1 language and ISO-3166-1 country code. Ex: 'en_US'.

scale.description: The requested scale for the image.

source.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

w.description: The requested pixel width for any images. If width is provided height must also be provided.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

$ul: **annotationType**: The type of annotation this data is for.
**title**: The display title and localized canonical name to use when searching for this entity on Google search.
**source**: The source, url and attribution for this dictionary data.
**encodedData**: Base64 encoded data for this annotation data.
**id**: Unique id for this annotation data.
**layerId**: The Layer id for this data. *
**updated**: Timestamp for the last time this data was updated. (RFC 3339 UTC date-time format).
**volumeId**: The volume id for this data. *
